title: Tiger + Screen Shot = PNG
content: I can’t find it. I know someone asked about it. I just found that the default image format for screen shots can be changed using the handy utility — which some say is incredibly dangerous in the wrong hands — [Cocktail](http://web.archive.org/web/20051122170541/http:/www.macosxcocktail.com/) created by Kristofer Szymanski. Personally, I’m find with PNG and will not be changing it.
author: Miss Tiffany

comments.content:
See this link. You can chang it to any format you like.

http://www.macosxhints.com/article.php?story=20050627224051361&query=screen+shot
